short_summary: Temperature Controlled, High Cube Metal Storage Container for Department of National Defence (DND)
description: DND requires the purchase of a Temperature Controlled High Cube Metal Storage Container.

- **tenderDescriptionDescriptionAppelOffresEng**: The Department of National Defence requires the purchase of a temperature-controlled, high-cube metal storage container. The container must provide a secure and climate-controlled storage and work space for spare parts used in the repair of essential operation-affecting equipment. The container shall be designed to withstand minor impact and unauthorized entry, have a durable finish, and allow for easy cleaning and relocation. Delivery is expected on or before 28 March 2024. Tendering procedures: All interested suppliers may submit a bid.
